title: Caution Notice

content.introduction:
Dear user,

Before you use the Loop software, please be aware of the following risks:

body.title: Identity
body.content: LoopAssets simply leverage blockchain technology to Loop the price of underlying assets, and are not actual assets. No custodian holds underlying assets for you on your behalf. You hold no legal rights to the underlying assets, only to Looped tokens to the blockchain. Go to Loop.finance to learn more about Looped assets.

body.title: Significant risks
body.content: While the Loop Protocol has been carefully engineered to have its tokens track the price of targeted assets closely, it is a new technology that may contain significant risks, bugs, or issues that may lead the software to not work as intended. The Loop Wallet does not make any guarantees of the correctness of the software, and disclaim that the underlying software is intended to be used AS-IS, and is to be used at your own risk.

body.title: Limitations in ownership
body.content: Given that Looped assets are simple synthetic tokens, they do not confer to the bearer many rights that are to be expected in holding the actual underlying asset, such as governance rights and rights to dividends.

body.title: Agency disclaimer
body.content: No entity, including the Loop Wallet team, has control over the list of assets that are listed on the Loop Protocol. Users can vote in various assets controlled by random people. The Loop Wallet team is not responsible for the listing and failure of any Looped assets on the Loop Protocol.

footer: I have read and understand these risks, and wish to proceed.
